text: The 2011 International GTSprint Series season was the second year of the International GTSprint Series. The season began at Monza on 10 April and finished at Vallelunga on 9 October. Gaetano Ardagna and Giuseppe Cirò won the championship, driving a Ferrari. ==Teams and drivers== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! Team ! Car ! No. ! Drivers ! Class !
